description: Example data for testing the stake + profit share model

strategies.title: Bitcoin Scalping Strategy - RSI Based
strategies.description: Day trading BTC using RSI indicators for precise entry and exit points. Best for volatile markets with 1-5 minute candles.
rules: Sell when RSI > 70 or hit 2% stop loss
Only trade during high volume hours (9am-4pm EST)
Close all positions before market close

strategies.title: Ethereum Swing Trading - MACD Crossovers
strategies.description: Multi-day position strategy using MACD crossovers for entry/exit. Lower frequency, higher conviction trades.
rules: Enter long when MACD crosses above signal line on daily chart
Exit when MACD crosses below signal line
Confirm with RSI > 50 for bullish momentum
Set stop loss at -5% from entry

strategies.title: Solana DeFi Yield Farming Rotation
strategies.description: Optimize yields across Stellar DEX and liquidity pools by rotating capital based on APY differentials.
rules: Rotate to highest APY pool if differential > 2%
Account for gas fees in ROI calculation

proof.title: Week 1 BTC Scalping Results - Profitable
proof.summary:
Starting capital: $10,000
Completed 15 trades following RSI<30 entry, RSI>70 exit rules
Final balance: $12,000
Total P&L: +$2,000 (+20%)

Key trades:
- Bought 0.15 BTC at $65,400 on Feb 7 10:30 AM EST
- Sold at $66,200 for +$120 profit
- Bought 0.2 BTC at $64,800 on Feb 7 2:45 PM EST
- Sold at $65,500 for +$140 profit

All trades followed strategy rules, entered when RSI<30, exited when RSI>70.

aiVerdict.reason: All trades followed strategy rules. Entry points verified at RSI<30, exit points at RSI>70. Oracle confirmed BTC prices match claimed values within 0.5% tolerance. Profit calculation accurate. Strong evidence provided.

proof.title: Week 1 BTC Scalping Results - Loss
proof.summary:
Starting capital: $10,000
Completed 12 trades following RSI strategy rules
Final balance: $8,500
Total P&L: -$1,500 (-15%)

Tried to follow strategy but market conditions were unfavorable. Entered at RSI<30 as required, but price continued dropping before hitting RSI>70 exit.

All stop losses were respected at -2% as per strategy rules.
steps: Trade screenshots showing RSI indicators: https://i.imgur.com/loss-trades.png

aiVerdict.reason: Trader followed all strategy rules correctly. Losses were due to market conditions, not rule violations. Entered at RSI<30, respected 2% stop losses. Evidence confirms legitimate trading activity.

proof.title: ETH Swing Trade - Week 1
proof.summary:
Starting capital: $15,000
Completed 3 swing trades using MACD crossover strategy
Final balance: $16,200
Total P&L: +$1,200 (+8%)

Trade 1: Entered ETH at $3,200 on MACD cross, exited at $3,350 (+$450)
Trade 2: Entered at $3,280, stopped out at $3,116 (-$164)
Trade 3: Entered at $3,150, exited at $3,380 (+$914)

All trades confirmed with RSI>50 as required by strategy.
